channel.title: Server status
channel.description:
Ok so a long time ago i made a server with my friend and we used his ip for the server status page it wasnt a big server we only got about 169 votes and now he is hosting his own and im hosting my own but its under my acc and it still has his ip on it is there any way i can change the ip on the status board cause he shuts his server down alot and i need it at 100% to get players please respond asap Thanks :)
P.S this is the link http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=85.248.229.179

item.title: Server status
